INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the plasma concentrations of estramustine by the clodronate
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring during the administration of these substances together.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the estramustine
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the calcium salts at a different time from the estramustine (more than 2 hours apart if possible).

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Risk of increase of the undesirable effects of the angioneurotic edema type (angioedema)
